document.title: A maximum entropy approach to multiple classifiers combination
document.abstract: In this paper, we present a maximum entropy (maxent) approach to the fusion of experts opinions, or classifiers outputs, problem. The maxent approach is quite versatile and allows us to express in a clear, rigorous, way the a priori knowledge that is available on the problem. For instance, our knowledge about the reliability of the experts and the correlations between these experts can be easily integrated: Each piece of knowledge is expressed in the form of a linear constraint.
